turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi can you order me a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Solano in Berkeley.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! What drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a cinnamon dolce latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is the medium size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There are two medium sizes, tall and grande which are 12 and 16 ounces.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like the tall then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! What milk would like in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there a non dairy option?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is almond and soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like soy milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To confirm, you would like a tall cinnamon dolce latte with soy milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have put in an order, so your drink will be available for pickup shortly at the Starbucks on Solano.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your phone through text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, goodbye!
